title: A Chance decision
creator_credit: Graham Goulding, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: A chance decision led Graham Goulding into a teaching job in China where the banquets were endless and he and his colleagues were treated like royalty. A unique adventure that has remained with Goulding long after his return to Gippsland.
